steps.name: bam2fq
steps.command: samtools bam2fq NA12878-Macrogen-chr22.bam > NA12878.fastq

steps.name: align
steps.command: bwa mem -CMp -t 4 -R "@RG\tID:0\tLB:Library\tPL:Illumina\tSM:NA12878" ucsc.hg19.fasta NA12878.fastq > NA12878.bwa.sam

steps.name: samtobam
steps.command: samtools view -Sbt ucsc.hg19.fasta.fai -o NA12878.bwa.bam NA12878.bwa.sam

steps.name: mergeinputbams
steps.command: java -Xms8g -Xmx8g -jar /opt/picard-tools-1.32/MergeSamFiles.jar TMP_DIR=/outside INPUT=NA12878.bwa.bam USE_THREADING=true CREATE_INDEX=true OUTPUT=NA12878.bwa.sorted.bam

steps.name: indexbam
steps.command: samtools index NA12878.bwa.sorted.bam

steps.name: extractchromosome
steps.command: samtools view NA12878.bwa.sorted.bam chr22 -bo chr22.bam

steps.name: indexchromosomebam
steps.command: samtools index chr22.bam

steps.name: fixindexnamechromosome
steps.command: python /opt/fix_bai_name.py chr22.bam.bai

steps.name: markduplicates
steps.command: java -Xms5g -Xmx5g -jar /opt/picard-tools-1.32/MarkDuplicates.jar TMP_DIR=/outside I=chr22.bam O=chr22.nodup.bam M=chr22.bam.metrics VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=SILENT ASSUME_SORTED=true REMOVE_DUPLICATES=false

steps.name: indexnodupbam
steps.command: samtools index chr22.nodup.bam

steps.name: fixindexnamenodup
steps.command: python /opt/fix_bai_name.py chr22.nodup.bam.bai

steps.name: findtargets
steps.command: java -Xms8g -Xmx8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T RealignerTargetCreator -I chr22.nodup.bam -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -o chr22.realn.intervals -L chr22 -known Mills_and_1000G_gold_standard.indels.hg19.vcf -known 1000G_phase1.indels.hg19.vcf -et NO_ET -K stanford.edu.key -nt 8

steps.name: realign
steps.command: java -Xms8g -Xmx8g -Djava.io.tmpdir=/outside -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T IndelRealigner -I chr22.nodup.bam -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -o chr22.realn.bam -L chr22 -targetIntervals chr22.realn.intervals -known Mills_and_1000G_gold_standard.indels.hg19.vcf -known 1000G_phase1.indels.hg19.vcf -et NO_ET -K stanford.edu.key

steps.name: fixmatepairs
steps.command: java -Xms8g -Xmx8g -jar /opt/picard-tools-1.32/FixMateInformation.jar TMP_DIR=/outside INPUT=chr22.realn.bam OUTPUT=chr22.realn.fixed.bam VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=SILENT SORT_ORDER=coordinate

steps.name: indexrealnbam
steps.command: samtools index chr22.realn.fixed.bam

steps.name: fixindexrealn
steps.command: python /opt/fix_bai_name.py chr22.realn.fixed.bam.bai

steps.name: bqsr
steps.command: java -Xms5g -Xmx5g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T BaseRecalibrator -I chr22.realn.fixed.bam -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -o chr22.recal.grp -knownSites Mills_and_1000G_gold_standard.indels.hg19.vcf -knownSites 1000G_phase1.indels.hg19.vcf -knownSites dbsnp_138.hg19.vcf -K stanford.edu.key -nct 8

steps.name: printreads
steps.command: java -Xms5g -Xmx5g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -I chr22.realn.fixed.bam -o chr22.recal.bam -T PrintReads -BQSR chr22.recal.grp -K stanford.edu.key -nct 8

steps.name: indexbamrecal
steps.command: samtools index chr22.recal.bam

steps.name: fixindexrecal
steps.command: python /opt/fix_bai_name.py chr22.recal.bam.bai

steps.name: haplotypecaller
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -Djava.io.tmpdir=/outside -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T HaplotypeCaller -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -I chr22.recal.bam --dbsnp dbsnp_138.hg19.vcf -o chr22.gatk.vcf.hc.vcf -stand_call_conf 20.0 -stand_emit_conf 10.0 --genotyping_mode DISCOVERY -nct 8

steps.name: selectsnps
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T SelectVariants -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -V chr22.gatk.vcf.hc.vcf -o chr22.gatk.vcf.snp -selectType SNP

steps.name: selectindels
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T SelectVariants -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -V chr22.gatk.vcf.hc.vcf -o chr22.gatk.vcf.indel -selectType INDEL

steps.name: combinesnpsindels
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -T CombineVariants --variant chr22.gatk.vcf.snp --variant chr22.gatk.vcf.indel -o chr22.gatk.vcf

steps.name: mergechromosomebams
steps.command: java -Xms5g -Xmx5g -jar /opt/picard-tools-1.32/MergeSamFiles.jar TMP_DIR=/outside INPUT=chr22.recal.bam USE_THREADING=true CREATE_INDEX=true OUTPUT=genome.recal.bam

steps.name: combinevcfs
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -T CombineVariants --variant:VCF /outside/chr22.gatk.vcf -o NA12878.gatk.vcf

steps.name: selectsnpsforvqsr
steps.command: java -Xmx6g -Xms6g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T SelectVariants -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -V NA12878.gatk.vcf -o NA12878.snp.vcf -selectType SNP

steps.name: trainvqsrforsnps
steps.command: java -Xmx6g -Xms6g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T VariantRecalibrator -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -input NA12878.snp.vcf -resource:hapmap,known=false,training=true,truth=true,prior=15.0 hapmap_3.3.hg19.vcf -resource:omni,known=false,training=true,truth=true,prior=12.0 1000G_omni2.5.hg19.vcf -resource:1000G,known=false,training=true,truth=false,prior=10.0 1000G_phase1.snps.high_confidence.hg19.vcf -resource:dbsnp,known=true,training=false,truth=false,prior=2.0 dbsnp_138.hg19.vcf -an DP -an QD -an FS -an MQRankSum -an ReadPosRankSum -tranche 100.0 -tranche 99.9 -tranche 99.0 -tranche 90.0 -mode SNP -recalFile NA12878.tmp.snp.vcf -tranchesFile NA12878.tranches.gatk.snp.recal.csv -nt 8 -rscriptFile NA12878.gatk.recal.snp.R

steps.name: vqsrsnps
steps.command: java -Xmx3g -Xms3g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T ApplyRecalibration -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -input NA12878.snp.vcf --ts_filter_level 99.0 -tranchesFile NA12878.tranches.gatk.snp.recal.csv -recalFile NA12878.tmp.snp.vcf -o NA12878.vqsr.snp.vcf --mode SNP

steps.name: selectindelsforvqsr
steps.command: java -Xmx6g -Xms6g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T SelectVariants -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -V NA12878.gatk.vcf -o NA12878.indel.vcf -selectType INDEL

steps.name: trainvqsrindels
steps.command: java -Xmx6g -Xms6g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T VariantRecalibrator -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -input NA12878.indel.vcf -resource:mills,known=true,training=true,truth=true,prior=12.0 Mills_and_1000G_gold_standard.indels.hg19.vcf -an DP -an FS -an MQRankSum -an ReadPosRankSum -tranche 100.0 -tranche 99.9 -tranche 99.0 -tranche 90.0 -mode INDEL -recalFile NA12878.tmp.indel.vcf -tranchesFile NA12878.tranches.gatk.indel.recal.csv --maxGaussians 4 -nt 8 -rscriptFile NA12878.gatk.recal.indel.R

steps.name: vqsrindels
steps.command: java -Xmx6g -Xms6g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T ApplyRecalibration -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -input NA12878.indel.vcf --ts_filter_level 99.0 -tranchesFile NA12878.tranches.gatk.indel.recal.csv -recalFile NA12878.tmp.indel.vcf -o NA12878.vqsr.indel.vcf --mode INDEL

steps.name: mergecalibratedvcfs
steps.command: java -Xmx8g -Xms8g -jar /opt/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -R ucsc.hg19.fasta -T CombineVariants --variant:VCF NA12878.vqsr.indel.vcf --variant:VCF NA12878.vqsr.snp.vcf -o genome.recal.vcf

steps.name: compressvcf
steps.command: bgzip -fc genome.recal.vcf > genome.recal.vcf.gz

steps.name: indexcompressedvcf
steps.command: tabix -p vcf genome.recal.vcf.gz
